headline: MATSUI AMERICA MOLD TEMPERATURE CONTROLLER
description: Mold Temperature Controller    Matsui America MC III-130/40HX
specstable:
Manufacturer Matsui
Model MC III-130/40HX
Description Mold Temperature Controller Water Heater Unit
Minimum Temperature 60 ºC (140 ºF, 333.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 130 ºC (266 ºF, 403 ºK)
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Number of Control Zones 1
Accessories

Reverse phase alarm
Pump overload
Medium level-drop
Faulty temperature sensor
Over heat
Highest & lowest alarm

Other Information

Heating & Cooling-PID
Heater Box Material SUS304 -11.7-L
Heater #1 -8-kw
Heater #2-7.6kw
Digital indication & setting

Power Requirements 460 V 30.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1995
Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Depth 29.000 in (73.7 cm)
Height 32.000 in (81.3 cm)
Weight 332 lb (151 kg)
